BeRichHome.title: Your Digital Hub for Developer Success
BeRichHome.description: Transform from coding beginner to confident developer with personalized roadmaps, comprehensive documentation, and a supportive learning ecosystem designed for your success.

v1.title: Desktop Foundation
v1.subtitle: Python & Tkinter Era
v1.description: Native desktop application offering automated, pre-populated daily report generation.

v2.title: Web Revolution
v2.subtitle: Flask & Server-Side Rendering
v2.description: Complete shift to a web-based platform, enabling multi-user access and real-time collaboration, with integrated learning documents.

v3.title: Modern Stack
v3.subtitle: React & Component Architecture
v3.description: Comprehensive rebuild with the React ecosystem, introducing component-based architecture and modern development workflows.

v4.title: Performance Leap
v4.subtitle: App Router & Server Components
v4.description: Advanced performance optimizations using Next.js App Router, React Server Components, and strategic caching.

v5.title: Enterprise Ready
v5.subtitle: AI-Powered, Scalable & Multi-Language
v5.description: Flagship release delivering AI-driven insights, enterprise-grade security, unlimited scalability, multi-language support, plus an LLM chatbot with RAG integration and offline repositories.

History.intro1: From desktop prototype to enterprise-grade platform.
